detail_desc: Gently flared, sleeveless jersey tunic.
Calf-length, sequined mesh dress in a narrow cut at the top with an opening at the front. Concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, gently pleated skirt. Lined.
Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Patterned bodysuit with press-studs on the shoulders and at the crotch. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber soles.
Hat in crocheted paper straw. Width of brim 7 cm.

Short-leg briefs in sturdy microfibre with a high waist and comfortable support for the tummy and back. The briefs are made with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and a soft feel against the skin. Lined gusset.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend containing some wool with a stand-up collar, decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Wide trousers in a soft Tencel™ lyocell blend with no waistband and pleats at the top. Zip fly, side pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Small, folding hairbrush with a mirror inside. Faux fur and decorative appliqués on the lid. Diameter 7 cm.
Long-sleeved, striped jersey top in a viscose and cotton blend with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and jacquard-knit details. Seamless.
Knee-length shorts in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a wide elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Set with a vest top and shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Vest top with a racer back. Shorts with a contrasting colour waistband.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy patterned weave with a V-neck opening at the front, ties at the top and a pleated trim around the neckline and sleeves. Lined.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Shorts in soft, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbing at the waist and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.

Jacket in washed denim with metal buttons, a faux shearling-lined collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and button at the sides. Faux shearling lining.
Triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small lace trim, decorative gathers on the cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a motif. Round neckline, short sleeves, and rounded and longer at the back.
Trousers in fine-knit cotton containing some linen with a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and straight legs. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit.
Short, fitted T-shirt in soft, ribbed, printed cotton jersey.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round pendant.
Metal rings in various designs, two of which are decorated with a plastic stone.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in printed jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short skirt in woven fabric made from a linen blend with a high paper bag waist, detachable tie belt, pleats at the top, buttons down the front and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.
Ankle-length trousers in supple imitation leather with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front pockets and straight legs with seams above the knees.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long, wide dress in an airy weave with button-top shoulder straps and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, long sleeves and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a small stand-up collar and long, wide sleeves that taper at the cuffs. Tapered waist and a flared peplum.
Knee-length tunic in a silk and modal weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.

Pull-on joggers in stretch, supersoft denim in a loose fit with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Patch front pockets, a flap back pocket with a hook and loop fastening, and legs with elasticated hems.
Sarong in patterned satin with ties at the sides. Can be worn as a skirt in a variety of lengths.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Matt opaque tights with a control top to hold in the tummy and bum. 200 denier.
Leather sandals with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) insoles and rubber soles.
Body in lace and mesh with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups lined with mesh in a contrasting colour and an elasticated seam under the bust. Lined cups with press-studs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a regular waist and flared legs. Wide waistband with a concealed key pocket.

Padded, oversized jacket in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, concealed side pockets with a zip and long sleeves with narrow ribbed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. The filling is made from recycled polyester.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with satin lapels, a concealed press-stud at the front and welt front pockets. Short slits in the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Headband in a soft double knit with a wrapover detail at the front.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with press-studs at the front and a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Polo-neck collar knitted in a cashmere blend.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist and lined gusset.
ACE TEE X H&M. Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Shorter, sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep V-neck, wide shoulder straps and narrow smocking at the front. Seam at the waist with a peplum.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with embroidery and appliqués on the knees. Elasticated waist, fake fly, a small coin pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in airy cotton seersucker with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a small frill trim and decorative, tasselled bow at the waist.
Short-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed fastener at the top and ties at the side.
Blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, long sleeves and wide cuffs with a covered button.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Microfibre underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short A-line skirt in cotton corduroy with decorative buttons at the front. Unlined.
Belt in split leather with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and raw-edge hems.

Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, and pleated flounces and inset lace trims at the front that continue over the shoulders. Unlined.
Sleeveless body in mesh with a flock print on the front, stand-up collar, and press-studs at the crotch.
Trainers with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with a button. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button (press-stud for sizes 2-8Y). Regular fit.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front, low-cut back and narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy denim with a zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
